opera.discovery
Class ServiceList

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      opera.discovery.ServiceList

public final class ServiceList
extends com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject

This class has no public constructor. A list of services.

ServicesLists are exposed as the DeviceDescriptor.getServices() method.

service = device.getServices().getServiceByIndex(3);
service = device.getServices().getServiceByServiceId(serviceId);

Method Detail

getSize

public int getSize()
Number of services in this list.

getServiceByIndex

public ServiceDescriptor getServiceByIndex(int index)
Get the service at the given position in the list.

Parameters:
index - Positive integer denoting the position of the service in the list.
Returns:
Service at the given position, or undefined if the index is out of bounds.

getServiceById

public ServiceDescriptor getServiceById(java.lang.String id)
Get the service with the given id from the list.

Parameters:
id - Identifier of the service to retrieve.
Returns:
Service with the given identifier, or undefined if no service has the given identifier.
